titles: The royal politician represented in one hundred emblems written in Spanish by Don Diego Saavedra Faxardo ... ; with a large preface, containing an account of the author, his works, and the usefulness thereof ; done into English from the original, by Sir Ja. Astry.
Idea de un príncipe político-cristiano. English
author: Saavedra Fajardo, Diego de, 1584-1648.
Astry, James, Sir.
publisher: Printed for Matt. Gylliflower ..., and Luke Meredith ...,
notes: Frontispieces, title pages and illustrations are engraved.
